doNotScoreActiveQuest.name: Active Quest
doNotScoreActiveQuest.description: At the end of the game your garrisoned active quest are not considered owned by you for scoring purposes.

freeTribes.name: Free Tribes
freeTribes.description:
Unlike all other civilisations, the Taino consider *all* Resource tokens on their cards as Resources in their pool during Scoring.
This means that placing (for example) {material} tokens on [Zemi] does not reduce the points you score for cards like [Moneylenders].

leader.name: Leader
leader.description: A card from your civilization, named after a singular person.

alienProgress.name: Special Scoring Rule
alienProgress.description: Score 1VP for every 3{progress} at game end instead of 1 each.

noNegativeFromUnrest.name: Special Scoring Rule
noNegativeFromUnrest.description: You do not score any negative points for {unrest}.

resourceOnCard.name: Resource on Card
resourceOnCard.description:
When instructed to place a resource on a card, take the resource in question from the supply.
When instructed to move a resource to a card, take the resource in question from the owner's Resource Pool.
If a pinned card you have in play with resources on it leaves play (abandoned, recalled, etc), gain all resources that were on the card.
Resources on cards are not yours (unless explicitly noted otherwise).

promoAbundance.name: About this Promo
promoAbundance.description:
Belong to Turczi Junior Promo Pack.
While setting up, if the civilization you're playing has a card exactly called [Prosperity], you may opt to use this card instead.
If you do, remove one [Prosperity] from your deck (return it to the box) and place [Abundance] in its place.
If your civilization has multiple copies of [Prosperity], choose at most one to replace.

acclaimed.name: Break Through for a {variable} Card
acclaimed.description: When you Break Through for a {variable} card, follow the normal rules for Breaking Through, but you may either choose a card from the Market ro to reveal cards from the Main deck.

heirPresumptive.name: About this Promo
heirPresumptive.description:
Belong to Turczi Junior Promo Pack.
To use this card, simply shuffle it into the common cards before setup.
Do not have to remove another card.

bountiful.name: About this Promo
bountiful.description:
Belong to Turczi Junior Promo Pack.
To use this card, shuffle it into the Fame deck and then randomly remove one card from the Fame deck without revealing it during setup.
The number of cards in the Fame deck won't change.
